You can join the official JZBot chat room [http://webchat.freenode.net/?randomnick=1&channels=jzbot here]. A list of the nicknames used by the JZBot developers at that chat room is available [People here].

For the technically inclined, you can also join the official JZBot chat room at irc.freenode.net, channel #jzbot, using an IRC client such as *Pidgin* or *!ChatZilla*.
